posts.title: Enjoying the classical art
posts.Author: Admin
posts.discription: Siddhartha Gautama, the Lord Buddha, was born in 623 B.C. in the famous gardens of Lumbini, which soon became a place of pilgrimage. Among the pilgrims was the Indian emperor Ashoka, who erected one of his commemorative pillars there.

posts.title: Enjoying the classical art
posts.Author: Shrish
posts.discription: Science generates solutions for everyday life and helps us to answer the great mysteries of the universe. In other words, science is one of the most important channels of knowledge.
